members.name: Rina Chowdhury
members.bio: Rina has been working in civic engagement for over a decade, focusing on digital literacy and youth empowerment. She coordinates community workshops across Dhaka and believes in grassroots democracy through education.

members.name: Fozle Rahman
members.bio: Passionate about environmental conservation and community resilience. Works with local groups to address climate challenges.

members.name: Nadia Islam
members.bio: Nadia is a human rights advocate who uses technology to amplify marginalised voices. She moderates discussions on civic participation and runs digital safety workshops for activists and community organisers.

members.name: Imran Hossain
members.bio: Working with farmers to implement sustainable agricultural practices and climate adaptation strategies.

members.name: Sabrina Ahmed
members.bio: Sabrina bridges the gap between VNBD and educational institutions, cultural organisations, and youth networks. She has extensive experience in partnership development and believes in the power of collaborative civic action.

members.name: Tariq Mahmud
members.bio: Tariq leads environmental initiatives in coastal regions, working directly with communities affected by climate change. His work focuses on building resilience and advocating for sustainable development policies.

members.name: Ayesha Begum
members.bio: Community health worker focusing on maternal and child health in rural areas.

members.name: Kamal Uddin
members.bio: Kamal facilitates youth forums and coordinates educational outreach programmes in northern Bangladesh. He is committed to creating spaces where young people can develop civic skills and engage with democratic processes.

members.name: Fatima Khan
members.bio: Advocate for women's rights and gender equality in civic spaces.

members.name: Rashid Ali
members.bio: Rashid connects technology organisations with community initiatives, helping to build digital capacity for civic engagement. He works with universities and tech companies to create partnerships that benefit grassroots movements.

members.name: Sultana Parveen
members.bio: Working to protect animal rights and promote ethical treatment of animals in rural communities.

members.name: Jahangir Alam
members.bio: Jahangir is a technologist and educator who builds digital tools for civic participation. He trains young activists in using technology safely and effectively, and develops open-source platforms for community organising.

members.name: Dilara Haque
members.bio: Dilara uses arts and culture as tools for community building and civic dialogue. She organises cultural events that bring together diverse voices and create spaces for democratic expression through creative means.

members.name: Mizanur Rahman
members.bio: Teacher committed to improving educational access and quality in underserved areas.

members.name: Shahana Yasmin
members.bio: Public health professional working on women's health initiatives and health equity programmes.

members.name: Anwar Hossain
members.bio: Anwar collaborates with agricultural cooperatives and environmental groups to promote sustainable farming and climate resilience. He brings together farmers, scientists, and policymakers to address rural development challenges.

members.name: Roksana Begum
members.bio: Youth mentor helping young people develop leadership skills and civic awareness.

members.name: Munir Ahmed
members.bio: Environmental activist working on coastal protection and mangrove conservation in the Sundarbans region.

members.name: Nasima Akhter
members.bio: Nasima moderates discussions on gender equity and women's participation in civic life. She works to create inclusive spaces where women's voices are heard and valued in democratic processes.

members.name: Hafizur Rahman
members.bio: Software developer building digital tools for community organisation and civic participation.

members.name: Laila Hasan
members.bio: Laila co-founded VNBD's digital advocacy programme and leads efforts to document human rights issues through community reporting. She trains citizen journalists and manages the network's online platforms.

members.name: Zahirul Islam
members.bio: Trade unionist advocating for workers' rights and fair labour practices.

members.name: Taslima Khatun
members.bio: Artist using creative expression to engage youth in civic dialogue and community storytelling.

members.name: Masud Parvez
members.bio: Masud connects educational institutions with civic tech initiatives, helping schools and universities integrate democratic values and digital citizenship into their curricula. He coordinates student engagement programmes across the region.
